resources.string: How many players will there be?
Your Changes Have Not Been Saved
Are you sure you want to delete this game? Plays of this game will also be deleted.

Welcome to the Game Score Collections App. This app was created by Tiffanie, Sallin, Serena and Shadman.
 We have used resources from the following sources to make this game:
 Game Boy Icon
 Playing Card Icon
 Chess Piece Icon
 Animation Tutorial
 Bubble Animation Tutorial
 Ocean Background
 Passing Variable From Activity to Fragment Tutorial
 Read JSON Files from Assets using Gson 
 We would like to thank our special and cool alpha testers:
 Alisha Dhillon and Sonia Dhillon
On this screen, we will add a play of a game. Just tap on the "New Game" button and input the number of players and total score followed by tapping "Enter" button.\n Tap anywhere to continue.
Your Game Manager is empty! Click here to add a game configuration!
